remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會使用與下列附加的事件：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - 此委派，也會使用與基底項目上的下列路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 附加的事件發生於拖放作業時，可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The attached event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
